A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For me this falls between Rogue One and The Force Awakens in terms of my Star Wars movie ranking. I really enjoyed TFA\, and I was not particularly enthused with Rogue One. I had mixed feelings about this one. Which might have been Rian Johnson's goal\, but while there are plenty of movie styles/genres I watch hoping to be challenged\, Star Wars movies are not one of them. At the very least\, it seems to thumb its nose at TFA\, which is a weird decision to make\, all things considered. It still has a lot to enjoy\, but if your fondest memories are of the original trilogy and its themes\, brace yourself for this.
